resources.string: Utkarsh is not limited to one field but a beautiful amalgamation of every passion, skill and talent. Ranging from heavy debates to a night of hard-core rock, from presenting your business plan to enchant the audience with your performance on stage, from becoming a roadies and creating collage to compete with 0s and 1s.

Utkarsh is not limited to one field but a beautiful amalgamation of every passion, skill and talent. Ranging from heavy debates to a night of hard-core rock, from presenting your business plan to enchant the audience with your performance on stage, from becoming a roadies and creating collage to compete with 0s and 1s .The aim of Utkarsh can easily be formulated according to meaning of its name i.e. Transcendence and so we aim for the same and ace in every field to impress upon the dynamic personalities of our students. The 3-days of this mega annual fest of students of BBD Group during 18-20 March, 2015 at Lucknow shall comprise of Competitive Events under Cultural, Literary, Fine Arts, Technical & Sports categories..
